name: Darpan
body: ### Welcome to my site This is still a work in progress, and I plan to add more here as and when my time permits. I have added my Linkedin at bottom in case you want to learn more about me. ### Contact If you want to contact me, you can reach out to me on my linkedin or my email inboxdarpan@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
